title: My Portfolio
description: This project is my portfolio website that make use of React frmaework and front-end is styles with Sass. Uses HTML, CSS

title: Maze Solver using BFS
description: This project is a maze solver that uses the BFS to find the shortest path from the start to the end of the maze.

title: Simulator and Assembler
description: Implementation of a custom Assembler & Simulator for ISA using python script. Simulator executes machine code generated by assembler.
